text:
apr_proc_mutex_child_init calls unimplemented OpenMutexW and will fail to
compile on Windows CE.  The patch implements the expected behavior of OpenMutexW
by calling CreateMutex (which will open an existing mutex or create one if it
doesn't exist) and close the mutex and return an error unless CreateMutex
indicated that the mutex already existed.
creator: carnold@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 18500
Replaces call to OpenMutex to CreateMutex on WinCE
creator: carnold@apache.org
carnold@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18501
Improved patch

Second patch checks that CreateMutex succeeded before checking if mutex was
newly created.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
